item.title: Pedobear :P
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“dutchboy, post:18, topic:373064”][quote author=the wanderer link=topic=469081.msg3431395#msg3431395 date=1292379973]

Updated it with basic anims and 3d model

Anims are lulzy. I like your attempt though. Split it up into more ref points so you can actually move separate pieces of it.
[/quote]
No idea how
I just used datmaker for right hand animation.
And atleast my anims are smooth unlike 99,99% of all custom anims.[/quote]
You used the right hand animation, that is why. You have to split the parts up into separate parts where limbs and rotation points would be. You can do this with adding vertex weights.

Read full topic
